abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32726151, pmid33216817, pmid33206207, pmid32306036, pmid33203245, pmid32651978, pmid33205916, pmid32472679, pmid33190302, pmid33159154, pmid33147014, pmid32357209, pmid33202195, pmid33201912
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.11.24
